column5: I'm guessing this weekend is going to be pretty busy at Center Islands, but team Fury and company will be in search of pike from shore.  I'm hoping to test out some new inline spinner baits I've made recently and catch my first fish of the season (last year I had one January 1st!)   Anyone else gonna be pike fishing tomorrow? If you see us with a  small entarage (5 adults, 3 children) make sure you say hello!
Hey Clive,  Shame to miss you,  What part of that entourage are you?  Good luck with the new spinner!
Good luck Clive!!   Do you have a pic of your spinnersbaits?

I'll be the part of the entourage catching pike Grant   I'm not sure if I have neough time to post pic of the lures before I leave - hopefully I will have pictures of them hanging from the mouth of a TO pike!
